title: Angelo State University
description: We provide a complete educational experience and a values-based culture on our modern campus in the heart of West Texas. We are the Ram Family. Join us today.

headings: We’re with youevery step of the way.
paragraphs: welcomehome
Discover what you love through our variety ofacademic offerings.
Connect with your Ram Family and get plugged intocampus life.
We’re committed to helping you graduate with aslittle debt as possible.
Visit Us
Explore our beautiful campus in person!
Ortake a virtual tourfrom the comfort of your own home.
Our commitment to helping you succeed runs deep.
“It’s important to give back, because ASU feels like home. Ram Fam is not just a slogan, it’s the culture of this campus. Everyone gives back and is always trying to help others.”
Jarret Lujan, Class of 2016, 2017
Give Back
Live a#RAMFAMlife.
Campus EventsCampus News
Values are at the center of all we do, and each member of the Ram Family is part of our journey as we build a values-based culture.
Angelo State Core Values
of ASU students graduate debt-free while at Angelo State.
“You’re getting a good education when you come to ASU.”
“Angelo State is the best option as far as the lower cost and the education you receive.”
“Through the help of the Angelo State staff and faculty, I landed in a field that I never knew I would love. ASU’s faculty and staff got me to where I am today.”
“If you are looking for a place to get a high-quality education at a moderate price and are serious about a career when you graduate, ASU is the place for you.”

“ASU prepared me for my career by teaching me how to problem solve. Specifically, how to approach a large problem in small achievable steps. If you don’t give up, and you learn as you go, you can accomplish anything.”
“I had a lot of options for undergrad, but not a day goes by that I’m not glad I came to Angelo State University!”
“Angelo State was the first college that I actually felt at home at. I had a prior degree before Angelo State, but when people ask me – I’m a Ram.”
“I love our Core Values - they don’t disregard anyone. Anyone is welcome, and I really admire that.”
“I couldn’t be in a more comfortable environment anywhere else. Angelo State is a second home to me.”
“The faculty at ASU knew my worth before I saw it in myself. They helped pave a way for me.”
“I chose ASU because it feels like a home away from home that will always support me throughout my future endeavors.”
“The first time I was ever on campus, I was already registering for classes. I’ve been so grateful to be a part of the Ram Fam. This is a place where you can be yourself and grow.”
“The fact that ASU is more affordable than many universities offers an incredible opportunity to gain a quality learning experience at a great value.”
“I wish every college student could have the opportunity to experience what I had at Angelo State!”
“The professors and staff know me by name and believe in me; something I wouldn’t get at another university.”
“As an international student I wanted to attend a trustworthy university with a verifiable legacy and hometown feeling in a suburban location. ASU ticked all the boxes!”
“When I applied to ASU I was hoping for the ultimate college experience, little did I know that graduating debt free would be included as well!”
“This little campus appears innocuous due to its size and location, but it is teeming with brilliant professors, dedicated staff, and a real family atmosphere.”
“Not only does ASU support their students financially, but throughout the entire campus, from the AMAZING professors to thriving organizations. I couldn’t have chose a better university.”
“Angelo State is a place where people go to grow, develop and learn.”
Individual National Titles
National Championships
Lone Star Conference Championships
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.

“I had a lot of options for undergrad, but not a day goes by that I’m not glad I came to Angelo State University!”Megg DudleyClass of 2021

“The first time I was ever on campus, I was already registering for classes. I’ve been so grateful to be a part of the Ram Fam. This is a place where you can be yourself and grow.”Hannah CooperClasses of 2020 and 2021, Animal Science

“As an international student I wanted to attend a trustworthy university with a verifiable legacy and hometown feeling in a suburban location. ASU ticked all the boxes!”Matthew MbangaCEO of Foundations for Farming, Class of 2003
“When I applied to ASU I was hoping for the ultimate college experience, little did I know that graduating debt free would be included as well!”Beth SimmonsClass of 2019

“This little campus appears innocuous due to its size and location, but it is teeming with brilliant professors, dedicated staff, and a real family atmosphere.”Heidi MoyerDoctor of Physical Therapy, Adjunct Professor, Class of 2016

“Not only does ASU support their students financially, but throughout the entire campus, from the AMAZING professors to thriving organizations. I couldn’t have chose a better university.”Beth SimmonsClass of 2019
“Angelo State is a place where people go to grow, develop and learn.”Henry JacksonPresident, Buckner Children Family Services, Class of 1994
